shared.facades

Class BuildingFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.facades.AbstractFacade
      • shared.facades.BuildingFacade

  • public class BuildingFacade
extends AbstractFacade
    This facade creates an interface to communicate with the underlying building sub-model.

    • Method Detail

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad(@NotNull
                      Player player,
                      @NotNull
                      EdgeLocation buildLocation,
                      boolean isFree,
                      boolean isSetup)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Builds a road for the given player the specified location.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player who is building the road.
        buildLocation - The EdgeLocation on the map where the road is to be built.
        isFree - Whether the road is free to build.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Precondition:
        canBuildRoad(shared.models.game.Player, shared.locations.EdgeLocation, boolean, boolean) returns true for the given player and location.
        Postcondition:
        • Road is built on game map at specified location.
        • The player has one fewer unused roads.
        • Longest road may be given to the player if applicable.

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement(@NotNull
                            Player player,
                            @NotNull
                            VertexLocation buildLocation,
                            boolean isFree)
        Builds a settlement for the given player at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        buildLocation - The VertexLocation on the map where the settlement is to be built.
        isFree - Whether the current Player gets to build this for free.
        Precondition:
        canBuildSettlement(shared.models.game.Player, shared.locations.VertexLocation, boolean) returns true for the given player and location.
        Postcondition:
        • Settlement is built at given location.
        • Current Player has one fewer unused settlements.
        • Current Player gains one victory point.

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity(@NotNull
                      Player player,
                      @NotNull
                      VertexLocation buildLocation)
        Builds a city for the given player at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        buildLocation - the VertexLocation on the map where the city is to be built
        Precondition:
        canBuildCity(shared.models.game.Player, shared.locations.VertexLocation) returns true for the given player and location.
        Postcondition:
        • A new city is built at given VertexLocation.
        • Current Player has one fewer unused cities and one
        • more unused settlements.
        • Current Player gains one victory point.

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad(@NotNull
                            Player player,
                            @NotNull
                            EdgeLocation buildLocation,
                            boolean isFree,
                            boolean isSetup)
        Check to see if the given player is able to build a road.
        Parameters:
        buildLocation - the EdgeLocation where the Player wants to build a road
        isFree - whether the current Player gets to build this for free
        Returns:
        true if the player can build a road according to the rules of Catan; false otherwise
        Precondition:
        Player is currently in a game
        Postcondition:
        None.

      • getTotalRoadsBuilt

        public int getTotalRoadsBuilt(@NotNull
                              Player player)
        Get the number of roads a Player has built.
        Returns:
